noAccess: You don't have permission to this function. Click to send a request to grant it:

auth.cardDescription: Enter your company email and password that you use to log into your computer.

zod.emailNotFromBruss: The provided email does not belong to the bruss-group.com domain!
zod.passwordTooShort: Password must contain at least 5 characters!

toasts.systemError: System error. Please try again later or contact IT.

registerPage.title: Registration
registerPage.description: Create an account for an employee outside of BRUSS domain
registerPage.successDescription: Your account has been created. You can now log in.

errors.brussEmail: Company email already has an account in the system. Use your Windows domain password to log in.
errors.passwordMin: Password must be at least 8 characters
errors.emailExists: Account with this email already exists
errors.identifierExists: Account with this personnel number already exists
errors.employeeNotFound: Employee with this personnel number not found
errors.genericError: An error occurred. Please try again.

forgotPasswordPage.title: Forgot Password
forgotPasswordPage.description: Enter your email address and we'll send you a code to reset your password.
forgotPasswordPage.brussEmailWarning: This is a corporate domain email. Use your domain password (same as for logging into your computer).
forgotPasswordPage.codeDescription: Enter the code received at your email address to reset your password.
forgotPasswordPage.successDescription: Your password has been successfully reset. You can now log in with your new password.

errors.passwordMin8Chars: Password must be at least 8 characters
errors.codeExpired: Code has expired. Please request a new code.
errors.genericError: An error occurred. Please try again.

home.title: Hello
home.description: I'm constantly working on improving the solutions you'll find here. Your opinion is extremely valuable to me - if you have any suggestions or questions, please contact me:

exportData.cardDescription: In case of wide range of criteria, the 10000 newest records will be downloaded.

rework.tooShortReason: Reason must have at least 20 characters!
rework.positionsLengthZero: Enter DMC code, hydra batch or pallet to search and mark as rework.
rework.checkPositionsAndReason: Check the correctness of found positions and enter reason to mark as rework.

z.workplace: Enter minimum 4 characters according to current naming
z.articleNumber: Article number must be in format: XXXXX or 10.0XXXXX.00 (X - integer)
z.dmcValidation: String of minimum 4 characters contained in DMC field
z.dmcSecondValidation: String of minimum 4 characters contained in DMC field, different than in "DMC validation value" field

add.cardDescription: Fill all data to add new article.
add.dmcFormDescription: Full content of scanned DMC code
add.dmcFirstValidationFormDescription: Constant code content (e.g. customer article number) - string that must contain scanned DMC code
add.dmcSecondValidationFormDescription: Use only when DMC contains two constant strings (beginning and end)!
add.hydraProcessFormDescription: HYDRA process from which the article comes (e.g. 050 - after EOL pressure control)
add.hydraProcessSelectPlaceholder: Choose process appropriate for the article
add.articleNoteFormDescription: Additional information about the article (e.g. packaging type, "common" name, etc.)

personsConfig.cardDescription: Fill all data to add new employee.
personsConfig.loginCodeFormDescription: Used for login in DMCheck application.
personsConfig.passwordFormDescription: Used in inventory process support application. Leave empty to skip.

toasts.exists: Personal number is already defined in database!
